name: Deluxe French Macaron Individual Charm - Food Jewelry - Macaron Jewelry
description:
The delicate crispy-chewiness of the delightful French macaron in a zero calorie option! These delicious macaron charms have been hand crafted and hung from vintage gold chaining. 

Each has its own unique flavor, please refer to the photo from left to right: Pistachio with Chocolate Ganache, Violet Creme, Orange Creamsicle, Banana Creme, Passionfruit, Rosewater, Classic Pistachio



♥--Nutritional Information--♥

Serving Size: 
● Charm length is approximately 1.75"
● The macaron is 1/4"x1/4"

-Ingredients
● Each tiny French macaron is hand-made by me with love (no molds!) using polymer clay in a clay-only oven. Every one is unique in shape and texture.
● Vintage gold-metal links with a lobster-claw clip at the end for easy addition on anything your heart desires! 

Serving Suggestions:
● Ideal to hook onto your cell phone charm!
● Easily add to your charm bracelet or necklace 
● Perfect mini delectable addition to your keyring
● Add to zipper pulls or loops for a unique embellishment
● Try clipping it onto your wallet!


♥♥ Thank-you for visiting Sucre Sucre Miniatures! ♥♥

name: Salmon Roe Nori Hand Roll - Pendant Charm - Food Jewelry - Sushi Charm
description:
A fresh salmon roe nori hand roll pendant charm for your necklace or bracelet. 
Delicate salmon eggs wrapped in savory nori, complete with fresh grated ginger and super hot wasabi!

Your charm will be finished with your choice color of a lobster claw clasp for easy attachment to whatever you'd like! Choose between gold, silver, or black.



♥--Nutritional Information--♥

-Serving Size:-
● Total length is 1.25"
● Each tiny sushi roll is about 1/2" long

-Ingredients-
● Each tiny sushi roll and all of the garnishes are hand-made by me with love (no molds!) using polymer clay in a clay-only oven. Every one is unique in shape and texture.
● Choose the color of lobster claw clasp for your charm to arrive on!

-Serving Suggestions:-
● Easily add to your charm bracelet or necklace 
● Perfect mini delectable addition to your keyring
● Add to zipper pulls or loops for a unique embellishment
● Try clipping it onto your wallet!
● Ideal to hook onto your cell phone charm!



♥♥ Thank-you for visiting Sucre Sucre Miniatures! ♥♥

name: Spring Mother's Day Charm Set - Food Jewelry - Petit Fours Candy Charms
description:
A beautiful charm set, perfect gift for Mom or that special someone with a spring birthday! 


A delicate serving of spring pastel petit fours, delicious french tiny confectionaries that are like little mini layer cakes! Often served (in my house at least!) with a dessert almond champagne!

In matching pastel colors, a sweet gift bag of classic Jordan almonds!


♥--Nutritional Information--♥

-Serving Size:-
● Charm lengths are approximately 3/4"

-Ingredients for pastel petit fours and jordan almonds!-
● Each piece is hand-made by me with love (no molds!) using polymer clay in a clay-only oven. Every one is unique in shape and texture.
● The petit fours rest atop gift ribbon stuffing and an acrylic platter, and the Jordan almonds are packaged inside a hand cut and made bag
● Gold findings, finished with lobster claw clasps

-Serving Suggestions:-
● A lovely party or wedding favor! Please convo me if you need larger quantities : )
● Ideal to hook onto a cell phone charm!
● Easily add to a charm bracelet or necklace 
● Add to zipper pulls or loops for a unique embellishment
● Try clipping it onto your wallet!


♥♥ Thank-you for visiting Sucre Sucre Miniatures! ♥♥

name: Grand Golden French Macaron Individual Charm - Food Jewelry
description:
Sucre Sucre is home of the golden macaron! Part of the Versailles miniatures collection.


The delicate crispy-chewiness of the delightful French macaron in a zero calorie option! 
These delicious macaron charms have been hand crafted and hang from a golden lobster claw clasp. A crisp, chewy golden crust filled with a ganache of your choice, and finished with fresh strawberries!

Choose from Vanille (white) filling, Chocolate (brown) filling, or Strawberry (pink/glitter) filling! 

Your macaron will arrive on a golden lobster claw clasp, ready to add to your favorite jewelry, phone charm, or anything you can think of!


♥--Nutritional Information--♥


-Serving Size:-
● Charm length is approximately 1.5"
● The macaron is 1/2"x1/2"

-Ingredients for the Golden Grand Macaron-
● Each tiny French macaron is hand-made by me with love (no molds!) using polymer clay in a clay-only oven. Every one is unique in shape and texture.
● Finished with a gold lobster-claw clasp for easy addition on anything your heart desires! 

-Serving Suggestions:-
● A lovely party or wedding favor! Please convo me if you need larger quantities : )
● Ideal to hook onto your cell phone charm!
● Easily add to your charm bracelet or necklace 
● Perfect mini delectable addition to your keyring
● Add to zipper pulls or loops for a unique embellishment
● Try clipping it onto your wallet!


♥♥ Thank-you for visiting Sucre Sucre Miniatures! ♥♥
